name: cld-light
description: A lightweight version of node-cld (100MB smaller on install)

scripts.postinstall: cd $(node -e "console.log(require('path').dirname(require.resolve('cld')))") && rm -r ./deps/ && find ./build -type f | grep -v 'cld.node' | xargs -I{} rm {}

author: Aaron O'Mullan <aaron@gitbook.com>
